casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Christopher FONTAINE. No. 37P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2004. William Stetzer, Assistant District Attorney, Susan Weigand, Jean Lawson, Assistant Public Defenders, Peter S. Gilhrist, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 22nd day of January 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Mecklenburg County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of March 2004."
